events.name: Registration
events.description:
Team Registration & breakfast.
Atleast one member from a team must be present for registration.

events.name: Event briefing
events.description: Networking among participants, judge introductions, and event briefing: rules and marking schemes. Check internet connections, confirm google classroom access. Double confirm everthings working and we are ready to roll.

events.name: Hackathon Begins
events.description:
With problem statement or event's theme released right before 8:00 AM, the hackathon begins. Participants will have 8 hours to work on their projects.
Tired of coding? Take a break and maybe play some games. Roam around the college. Help your self with rasna/tang and coffee available thorughout the day.
Mentors will be making rounds to check on every teams and help them with their projects. They will guide you to a right path if you found yourself lost.

events.name: Time to wrap up
events.description:
Prepare to wrap up your project. Make sure to submit your whole work's zip file before 4:00 PM in google classroom link provided to each team leader at the start of event.
Immediately call a voulnteer if you are facing any issues with submission.

At this time, its better if one or two members of your team start preparing for pitching & demostration. Presentation must contain two slides: 'The Problem we Identified' and 'Our Solution for that problem'.

events.name: Closing
events.description: Closing ceremony. Token of love for judges and mentors. Few wise words from Abhinav sir. Winners won't be announced that day.
